description: Hi! You have been hired to select the research programs that will receive funding from our institution this year. You will go through multiple rounds where you will be asked to select a grant proposal to be allocated funding.

instructions.overview: For each round, please review each proposal's portfolio. The portfolios include characteristics that the institution has decided are the strongest indicators of a proposal's potential success. Using the information available, please decide which research proposals shoulf be granted funding to the best of your ability. There will be feedback on some of the choices depending on how your supervisor feels about your choice.
instructions.BTWN: You won't be alone -- we have provided an AI assistant that has been trained to look at grant portfolios and use the institution's past selections and their outcomes to give you its recommendation. However, you are not required to use it.

reviews.description: These reviews were collected to provide more information about the AI we chose to include in this study. Potentially identifiable information has been anonymized to protect privacy. We hope these reviews help you in your decision-making process.

BTWN.author: 'aigeek.com
BTWN.body: An excellent continuation of Google's latest recommendation technology.

BTWN.author: Technology Today Magazine
BTWN.body: This assistant really proves the great things AI is capable of.

BTWN.author: businessnewsdaily.com
BTWN.body: Sometimes it feels like this AI understands the task better than people do.

WTHN.author: Nick V.
WTHN.body: Saved our funding program from a lot of unsuccessful choices, can't even imagine operating without it.

WTHN.author: Helen T.
WTHN.body: I didn't expect it to be so effective!

WTHN.author: Jim D.
WTHN.body: It helped me find some interesting proposals I would have otherwise missed, definitely improved the final outcome.
